name: Descending Troopers
description:
Descending Troopers (last updated - Dec 19, 2015)

PLAYABLE DEMO with 1 Hour+ of Gameplay

A Twist on a turret shooter. More than a hundred purchases and upgrades to keep you hooked up for hours. Very stable build. Primary weapons, primary weapon upgrades, secondary abilities and upgrades for each of them. Game will be updated regularly (Once a week) to make it better. All features upgrades already working, the game just requires some gameplay balancing after wave 25 (wave 25 should take you hours to reach).

The game is already very playable with all BGM, sound and effects

Local Co-op gameplay coming up before Christmas.

Please check the storepage in every 7 days to get the latest updated version.

All the DLCs will be free for the owner of the game.

Make sure to go through the tips on the title screen. Not many, but these will be very useful in enjoying the game.
